 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָסָה‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==test, try== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Pi\`el; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Pa\`el <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַסִּי‎</span>; Syriac Pa\`el <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; compare Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***temptation***); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסָּה‎</span> [[Deut.4.34|Deut 4:34]] + 3 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסָּהוּ‎</span> [[Exod.15.25|Exod 15:25]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְּתָה‎</span> [[Deut.28.56|Deut 28:56]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסִּיתִי‎</span> [[Eccl.7.23|Eccl 7:23]], + 4 t. Perfect; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנַסֵּם‎</span> [[Dan.1.14|Dan 1:14]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲנַסֶּה‎</span> [[Judg.6.39|Judg 6:39]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲנַסְּכָה‎</span> [[Eccl.2.2|Eccl 2:2]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנַסּוּ‎</span> [[Num.14.22|Num 14:22]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּנַסּ֑וּן‎</span> [[Exod.17.2|Exod 17:2]], + 7 t. Imperfect; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַס‎</span> [[Dan.1.12|Dan 1:12]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַסֵּנִי‎</span> [[Ps.26.2|Ps 26:2]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַסּוֺת‎</span> [[Exod.20.20|Exod 20:20]], + 8 t. Infinitive; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנַסֶּה‎</span> [[Deut.13.4|Deut 13:4]] — 

**1.** ***test, try*** (synonym <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בחן‎</span>), absolute [[1Sam.17.39|1Sam 17:39]] (a sword); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> [[Judg.7.39|Judg 7:39]]; [[Eccl.2.1|Eccl 2:1]] with accusative [[Dan.1.12|Dan 1:12]]; [[Dan.1.14|Dan 1:14]] accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> [[1Kgs.10.1|1Kgs 10:1]] = [[2Chr.9.1|2Chr 9:1]]; [[Eccl.7.23|Eccl 7:23]]. 

**2.** ***attempt, assay, try*** to do a thing, with Infinitive [[Deut.4.34|Deut 4:34]]; [[Deut.28.56|Deut 28:56]] with accusative [[Job.4.2|Job 4:2]] (***venture*** a word). 

**3.** ***test, try, prove, tempt*** [but not in modern sense of the word: see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[Deut.6.16|Deut 6:16]]</sup>; Psalms 453, 483] 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** God ***tests*** or ***proves*** Abraham [[Gen.22.1|Gen 22:1]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), Israel [[Exod.15.25|Exod 15:25]]; [[Exod.20.20|Exod 20:20]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Exod.16.4|Exod 16:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.8.2|Deut 8:2]]; [[Deut.8.16|Deut 8:16]]; [[Deut.13.4|Deut 13:4]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> [[Judg.2.22|Judg 2:22]]; [[Judg.3.1|Judg 3:1]]; [[Judg.3.4|Judg 3:4]] tribe of Levi [[Deut.33.8|Deut 33:8]] (poem); Hezekiah [[2Chr.32.31|2Chr 32:31]] psalmist [[Ps.26.2|Ps 26:2]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** Israel ***tests***, or ***tries*** God: [[Exod.17.2|Exod 17:2]]; [[Exod.17.7|Exod 17:7]]; [[Num.14.22|Num 14:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.6.16|Deut 6:16]]; [[Ps.78.18|Ps 78:18]]; [[Ps.78.41|Ps 78:41]]; [[Ps.78.56|Ps 78:56]]; [[Ps.95.9|Ps 95:9]]; [[Ps.106.14|Ps 106:14]] so Ahaz, [[Isa.7.12|Isa 7:12]].
